amendment.description: An amendment in the nature of a substitute printed in the bill and considered as adopted pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 168, for use as original text.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Amendment in the nature of a substitute reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment in the nature of a substitute reported by the House Committee on Rules.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
